scripts.start-vm: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd web && npm start"
scripts.start-mak: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "nodemon localtunnelMak.js" "cd web && npm start"
scripts.start-nut: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "nodemon localtunnelNut.js" "cd web && npm start"
scripts.start-poom: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "nodemon localtunnelPoom.js" "cd web && npm start"
